marklogic.body: People can and should keep their commentary to themselves. This is why I generally don't praise someone on their Weight loss. As for women being judged, that's certainly true. But look at where that judging is coming from. I see women commenting on each other's looks far more than men. You'll never hear a bunch of men sitting around a lunch table saying Joe lost weight or Joe's suit makes him fat. But in every workplace I've been, you'd Always hear women saying stuff about another woman's looks behind her back.
